item.title: Hello world from hugo static page generator
item.description:
First time with static site generator

Re-writing my personal website using static site generator hugo and following resources:

  • brilliant post by Thomas Kainrad
  • hosting on github pages instructions

item.title: Mateusz Korzeniowski
item.description:
Software Engineer since 2015

Expertise:

  • Python 2, 3, basics of asyncio
  • RabbitMQ message broker
  • Docker containers
  • Linux servers

Experience:

  • Kubernetes platform: participated in designing and implementing transition to k8s from docker-compose microservices service)
  • Java 8 (1.5 year in enterprise project)
  • SQL databases
  • microservices design, concurrent systems
  • various CI tools (GitLab Pipelines, Jenkins, Travis CI, Bamboo CI, GitHub Actions)
  • Agile development using LeSS methodology

Interested in, but not much experience:

  • basic devops (terraform, infrastructure-as-a-code patterns)
  • Golang
  • machine learning
  • front-end Javascript

Open-source

See Projects for some of my open source work

Located in Wrocław, Poland


Show full map

Contact

  • email emkor93@gmail.com
  • LinkedIn

item.title: Projects, tutorials, data
item.description:
Libraries / tools / services

  • built own library for image recognition on CCTV camera images, with YOLO model included , packaged and published as docker image for convenience
  • I’ve built Spotify playlist manager (alpha-stage!) using Vue.js
  • CLI tool for downloading movie subtitles published on pypi
  • (abandoned) audio feature extraction engine in microservice design, deployed on Docker, backed by Celery, RabbitMQ and MySQL
  • library for retrieving geolocation data for Wrocław public transit (tram and buses, basically)

Published data

  • harvesting and publishing Wrocław public transit geolocation data using Backblaze B2 service and Raspberry Pi hidden in my wardrobe :)

Instructions / tutorials

  • self-hosting OpenStack-based homelab server with instructions backed by Packstack
  • this website/blog :)
